snippet.title: Vampire: The Masquerade — Out for Blood
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1290350/Vampire_The_Masquerade__Out_for_Blood/

Gather your allies to hunt the vampires that terrorize your town! Study their ways and exploit their rivalries, or you'll become a vampire yourself.

"Vampire: The Masquerade — Out for Blood" is an interactive novel by Jim Dattilo, based on the role-playing game "Vampire: The Masquerade" and set in the World of Darkness shared story universe. It's entirely text-based, without graphics or sound effects, and fueled by the vast, unstoppable power of your imagination.

Take on the role of a vampire hunter to save your town from the influence of Chastain, a vampire more than a century old. When a group of young thin-blood vampires start a war with Chastain, will you choose sides, or hunt them all?

Gather your forces and sharpen your stake to take back the night!
